alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:09PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cache and northwestern Rich Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Laketown, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laketown, Garden City, Garden, Bear Lake and Meadowville. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 113 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
